achievements.desc: sports 1
sports 2
sports 3
sports max
mystery 1
mystery 2
mystery 3
mystery max

achievements.title: Casual reader
achievements.desc: Read over 100 manga. Looks like reading doesn’t hurt.

achievements.title: Bookworm
achievements.desc: Read over 200 manga. Sitting in your comfortable chair, reading favorite Korean comics. This is bliss.

achievements.title: Dat scent
achievements.desc: Read over 300 manga. There’s nothing better than the smell of freshly opened book. Or a PDF.

achievements.title: Where do I put these?
achievements.desc: Read over 400 manga. Consider investing in another bookshelf, or you’ll be swimming in books soon.

achievements.title: Half a grand
achievements.desc: Read over 500 manga. Read another five hundred and you can start bragging.

achievements.title: Read or die
achievements.desc: Read over 750 manga. Made a bow out of paper. Please remember that paper doesn’t work well as a bulletproof shield.

achievements.title: Librarian
achievements.desc: Read over 1000 manga. You work with books, right? Right?…

achievements.title: The floor is books
achievements.desc: Read over 1500 manga. Sleeping on books must be pretty… hard?

achievements.title: Still not enough
achievements.desc: Read over 2500 manga. You’ve read six lifetimes worth of words.

achievements.title: Sleep deprivation
achievements.desc: Read over 5000 manga. Think of all the mangakas and writers that couldn’t sleep just to make this moment happen.

achievements.title: Reincarnation
achievements.desc: Read over 7500 manga. How, exactly? This is not possible within one lifetime.

achievements.title: So many zeros
achievements.desc: Read over 10000 manga. An average user’s list is shorter than your list of titles starting with „A” alone.

achievements.title: Signed the contract
achievements.desc: Became a magical girl and started saving the world, step by step.

achievements.title: Magic is my middle name
achievements.desc: Transformed into a magical girl: level two. In the name of the Moon, I will punish you!

achievements.title: Too magical to comprehend
achievements.desc: Watched so many mahou shoujo anime that you sparkle occasionally.

achievements.title: Are you a wizard
achievements.desc: All limiters removed. You can call yourself a god, a wizard, or whatever you wish. You set the rules.

achievements.title: Normal high school boy
achievements.desc: Got started into the furious ride with slice-of-life anime.

achievements.title: cute × ( girls + things )
achievements.desc: Didn’t get bored of watching cute girls doing cute things.

achievements.title: Enjoying life
achievements.desc: Found the equilibrium between boring and interesting.

achievements.title: Prima Undine
achievements.desc: Awarded Ph.D. degree in sliceoflife-ology. You can teach others how to stay calm and take it easy.

achievements.title: So manly I can’t breathe
achievements.desc: Watching all those men made you feel like a little girl… and you liked it.

achievements.title: Testosterone storm
achievements.desc: Your body has adapted into GAR anime. You can hear your muscles growing.

achievements.title: You are already man.
achievements.desc: Resistance is futile. People are simply no match for you.

achievements.title: Alpha Male
achievements.desc: You aren’t made out of testosterone. Testosterone is made out of you.

achievements.title: Me? PILOT this thing?!
achievements.desc: A secret organization wants you to pilot a huge mecha. Can you do it?

achievements.title: Engineer
achievements.desc: After watching over 40 mecha anime you should be able to build your own mobile suit. Remember not to kill the rest of us.

achievements.title: Mechazawa
achievements.desc: Having watched over 60 mecha anime, you’ve probably became a robot already. Nice job, hero.

achievements.title: Pierce the H E A V E N S !
achievements.desc: Do the impossible. See the invisible. ROW ROW FIGHT THE POWAH! …You just sang that in your head, didn’t you?

achievements.title: History class
achievements.desc: History doesn’t have to be boring. There’s a lot to learn.

achievements.title: A look at passing time
achievements.desc: Instead of dreaming of the future, you prefer to look back at the past.

achievements.title: Archaeologist
achievements.desc: You found a calendar that says the world will end in 2012? Hah, who would fall for that?

achievements.title: Time machine
achievements.desc: Kids these days are boring. You’d rather watch something heartwarming about siblings catching fireflies.

achievements.title: Feels… weird, man
achievements.desc: Watched Boku no Pico. This is what you get when you follow /a/’s recommendations.

achievements.title: I love Chinese cartoons
achievements.desc: Mean anime score higher than 8.5. How about using the whole scale and re-rating stuff? That could make you look less like a fanboy…

achievements.title: Watching anime is suffering
achievements.desc: Mean anime score lower than 5. Someone has to counterweigh the fanboys, right?

achievements.title: Less than three
achievements.desc: Mean anime score lower than 3. Is this hate, or is this love?

achievements.title: The first step
achievements.desc: Watched over 100 anime. That’s a pretty good start.

achievements.title: Casual watcher
achievements.desc: Watched over 200 anime. You’re used to seeing character’s eyes bigger than their nose. If they have any nose.

achievements.title: A millionaire
achievements.desc: Watched over 300 anime. You DID buy all of them, right?

achievements.title: Bragging rights
achievements.desc: Watched over 400 anime. That’s… a lot. You can be proud of yourself, that’s for sure.

achievements.title: A lot of free time
achievements.desc: Watched over 500 anime. Now think of what kind of person you’d be if you didn’t start watching anime then. On that particular day…

achievements.title: Not even my final form
achievements.desc: Watched over 750 anime. Your power level is way above others’. The only way is up.

achievements.title: Gotta watch them all!
achievements.desc: Watched over 1000 anime. Congratulations, you broke the magical number. Take a breath now, it will only get more difficult.

achievements.title: The Collector
achievements.desc: Watched over 1500 animes. No, wait. The plural of anime is anime.

achievements.title: The Maniac
achievements.desc: Watched over 2500 anime. Is this healthy? You should contact your doctor.

achievements.title: The Living Legend
achievements.desc: Watched over 5000 anime. You’re one of the chosen ones. You don’t even have to brag, since everyone heard about you.

achievements.title: Database breaker
achievements.desc: Watched over 7500 anime. Are you having fun, breaking all the rules? By the way, do we even have that many anime in the database?!

achievements.title: This is it.
achievements.desc: Watched over 10000 anime. There is no higher level. You can stop now. Everyone, go home.
